### 需求内容：
1. 订单打标，子单打标。在（cn.zacz.retail.cloud.app.trade.xmyx.CustomOrderEnrichExtension）

2. 易宝支付在apapter-tob依赖易宝支付的SDK，提供2个接口。

3. 订单管理、订单详情页面

   （1）订单管理、订单详情发起售后按钮，若为跨境购订单隐藏发起换货、补寄选项

   （2）订单详情页面：增加跨境购订单标签展示、增加报关人姓名、报关人身份证号 展示（需按要求脱敏展示）

4. pg2易宝支付配合做相应调整，新增存入扩展字段请求易宝支付的原始请求和响应

5. rainbow修复生产BUG，密文导单根据订单平台获取默认用户编号

6. 修复生产BUG，窜货订单，商品维度，订单维度导出订单条数不对的问题。



## JWT

策略1：

策略名称：adapter-tb-xm-zuul

策略类型：路由-ZUUL

策略配置：
```yaml
zuul:
  routes:
    yeepayOrder:
      path: /yeepay/tob/order
      serviceId: adapter-service-tb
    yeepayAuth:
      path: /yeepay/tob/auth
      serviceId: adapter-service-tb
```


策略2：

策略名称：adapter-tb-xm-ribbon

策略类型：负载均衡-RIBBON

策略配置：

```yaml
adapter-service-tb:
  ribbon:
    NIWSServerListClassName: com.netflix.loadbalancer.ConfigurationBasedServerList
    NFLoadBalancerRuleClassName: com.netflix.loadbalancer.WeightedResponseTimeRule
    ConnectTimeout: 10000
    ReadTimeout: 20000
    MaxTotalHttpConnections: 500000
    MaxTotalConnections: 500000
    MaxConnectionsPerHost: 20000
    listOfServers: http://172.16.202.224:8080,http://172.16.202.244:8080
    useNIWSServer: true
```

策略3：

策略名称：adapter-tb-xm-jwt

策略类型：鉴权-JWT

策略配置：

```yaml
jwt:
  providers:
    adapterXmService:
      issuer: http://alibabacloud.com
      localJwks:
        kty: RSA
        kid: 735a8bc5-b310-4a3f-8b95-518eabf6559a
        e: AQAB
        alg: RS256
        n: AJNq7dc1I-1PhUWVIUwesPJayOwM7TRWV8TNUcK9LqNNBpk4Ul_kiZg2SEOPml6SMOp890qjGN7peJuv2CwvRS4ZyyBkwPvb8-7_hDYDKcc2ftJc1Nl1UVmNOmQNwzg1nHbdrDuB6KatMPQYLKBe7V5TnK3w4SlKEQEPFDsie7Liyw_vyYIUZjk2MPoV5My65WktNQBQbnqca6TGMNMmhccoPmO2qsSyybbuEWPfn4kQa6MdLGiOCjgcBCDVwvQ0DMhtxgt-mQGU9hZZkMeW5n3FeTkohkISoxSd3A2DN-pEQ_UTm4TjK_9paopUlcYpyutedRMBrwLBOAHTlru_F90=
        use: sig
      fromHeaders:
      - jwt-assertion
  rules:
  - match:
      path: /yeepay/tob/**
    requires:
      providerName: adapterXmService

```

请求方式：HTTPS

鉴权方式：JWT

header 

key : jwt-assertion

value：eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiJ9.eyJleHAiOjE3MTAxMjM4NjksImlzcyI6Imh0dHA6Ly9hbGliYWJhY2xvdWQuY29tIiwiaWF0IjoxNjE1NTE1ODcwLCJqdGkiOiI4NTUyZWMzZS0zODQ5LTQzZGUtODlhNi1kYjEwNTYwZDE4ZDEifQ.OFmGlaCbXdriZQKgjtfDcxmFtPM1UsUbIn8L_sgitFIqexfopFCPQSgoK2aL1MhWslZe8CoAYCdzZUg8dXY1dW7QFRpqMPQVDcCJJwFqjp0fIuK56WcyrlQg_0GytgGy0TxEYehGeHKrZHVLxCUVhcq3Yr83szpvo2DBSPkNHTmQAnQWtedXPrOJ2WFTj-9ALTy1YKvFmKxbBP8vxiohVZjwS7-XNeavHB372mVvS5c-lbEiaZIwxgE5CXuzAp5lVBzhlpEJ56BUXVBcYVQfBVMdwdK7jJLhD62QOR4-q10csZCuQQMlpuZyrwM1VZse672dON1TMlzkcJdKKYuTUA

环境：uat2

UAT2环境URL：60.205.176.248

接口路径：

1. /yeepay/tob/order
2. /yeepay/tob/auth

```json
{
    "kty": "RSA",
    "kid": "735a8bc5-b310-4a3f-8b95-518eabf6559a",
    "e": "AQAB",
    "alg": "RS256",
    "n": "AJNq7dc1I-1PhUWVIUwesPJayOwM7TRWV8TNUcK9LqNNBpk4Ul_kiZg2SEOPml6SMOp890qjGN7peJuv2CwvRS4ZyyBkwPvb8-7_hDYDKcc2ftJc1Nl1UVmNOmQNwzg1nHbdrDuB6KatMPQYLKBe7V5TnK3w4SlKEQEPFDsie7Liyw_vyYIUZjk2MPoV5My65WktNQBQbnqca6TGMNMmhccoPmO2qsSyybbuEWPfn4kQa6MdLGiOCjgcBCDVwvQ0DMhtxgt-mQGU9hZZkMeW5n3FeTkohkISoxSd3A2DN-pEQ_UTm4TjK_9paopUlcYpyutedRMBrwLBOAHTlru_F90=",
```

tag：https://uat2-oms.feihe.com/api/retailforce_oms/list_order_tags

订单详情：https://uat2-oms.feihe.com/api/retailforce_oms/trade_query_order_detail

com.alibaba.oms.portal.api.reverse.ReverseBasePortalService.reverseRouting

#### 飞鹤跨境购易宝生产环境ACM配置：

```yaml
#=================== 易宝 start ====================== 
yeepay: 
  appKey: cbp_120246425
  yopPublicKey: 
  isvPrivateKey: 
  yopBaseUri: https://openapi.yeepay.com/yop-center

#=================== 易宝 end ======================
```





#### 跨境购易宝提供的生产环境ACM配置：

```yaml
#=================== 易宝 start ====================== 
yeepay: 
  appKey: cbp_120180219
  yopPublicKey: 
  isvPrivateKey: 
  yopBaseUri: https://openapi.yeepay.com/yop-center

#=================== 易宝 end ======================
```







请查看您的易宝开放平台账号

 

尊敬的客户：

您好！

感谢注册易宝开放平台。您的管理员登录邮箱为：[wangshanlin@feihe.com](mailto:wangshanlin@feihe.com)，初始化登录密码是：WcmN963K，商户编号为：cbp:120246425，应用标识：cbp_120246425                   

 

有关易宝开放平台的接入请参考：

1，新手指南：https://open.yeepay.com/docs/platform_profile/new_guide

2，SDK使用：https://open.yeepay.com/docs/platform_profile/java_sdk_guide

3，开发工具：https://open.yeepay.com/#/sdk

4，鉴权机制：https://open.yeepay.com/docs/platform_profile/you_rsa

5，异步通知机制：https://open.yeepay.com/docs/platform_profile/5acc18ef2181f81b748b74c8

6，公共错误码管理：https://open.yeepay.com/docs/platform_profile/error_code

7，文档中心：https://open.yeepay.com/#/doc









测试环境  测生产的配置文件

```json
{
  "app_key": "cbp_120180219",
  "aes_secret_key": "",
  "server_root": "https://openapi.yeepay.com/yop-center",
  "yop_public_key": [
    {
      "store_type": "string",
      "cert_type": "RSA2048",
      "value": ""
    }
  ],
  "isv_private_key": [
    {
      "store_type": "string",
      "cert_type": "RSA2048",
      "value": ""
    }
  ],
  "http_client": {
    "connect_timeout": 10000,
    "read_timeout": 30000,
    "max_conn_total": 2000,
    "max_conn_per_route": 1000
  },
  "default": true
}

```
